name: Untitled Multiplayer Game - Third-person Protoype
description:
This is a prototype third-person shooter controller I've been working on and feedback is always welcome...

Controls

W-A-S-D Movement

Right mouse button to draw weapon

Left mouse button to shoot

Press H key to holster weapon

I've been away from my hobbyist game development thing for a while, and I've decided to try to build a multiplayer online survival game to challenge myself, and this is a damned ugly but workable first stab at a custom third-person control scheme. Also, this is a first-pass prototype and is obviously rough and raw, but I'm hoping people will take a look, try it out, and give me some good feedback.

And I can't do game art, so I'm using various pre-made art assets by Sytny Studios and a few other things like animations from the Unity Asset Store to get the ball rolling. Movement is done with a plain old character controller and 2D blend trees with some events and behaviors in play so nothing too complicated.

Moving Forward

What I know is crappy and needs to be fixed...

  • Animation transitions need to be cleaned up
  • Simple things like foot placement when turning and whatnot needs to be added
  • Camera collision works but can be better

To be added...

  • Add a melee attacks
  • Add rifles, shotguns, etc.
  • Add crouch/sneak
  • Add jumping and falling
